thread.title: Rant & Rave: Ex-smoker happy to clean up cigarette butts
thread.title_full: Rant & Rave: Ex-smoker happy to clean up cigarette butts | The Seattle Times

author: Submitted by Seattle Times readers
title: Rant & Rave: Ex-smoker happy to clean up cigarette butts
text:
RAVE To all the smokers who toss their butts into my roadside garden. Each time I weed and pick up your cigarette butts, I say a small thanks because I’m getting back some good karma for all those years I used to smoke.
RANT To pedestrians who walk through parking lots like there are no moving cars and people who drive through parking lots like there are no pedestrians. Wake up, people, and think about somebody other than yourself!
The Seattle Times publishes reader rants and raves on a space-available basis. We reserve the right to edit for length or content. Send yours to rantandrave@seattletimes.com .
